formElement.label: Target
formElement.documentation: Target machines where the file will be copied.

formElement.label: Pcre
formElement.documentation: If cheched the target expression will be interpreted as a pcre regular expression rather than a shell glob.

formElement.label: Grain
formElement.documentation: If cheched the target expression matches values returned by the salt grains system on the minions.

formElement.label: Source
formElement.documentation: Path to the file you want to copy e.g /home/user/myfile.txt

formElement.label: Destination
formElement.documentation: Location where you want to copy the file in minions. e.g /tmp.
